message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am offering it to you for $15000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you.
I'm very interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your feedback. In light of this, I am willing to consider your offer. For the time being, I am proposing to sell the product to you for $12000. This aligns closely with your suggested price while still allowing us to cover our costs and maintain a fair profit margin. Please let me know if this revised price works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After carefully considering your offer, I've decided to adjust our price to better suit both our interests. I am now willing to sell the product to you for $11000. This allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while still providing you with a competitive price. Please let me know if this revised price is acceptable.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $11000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your financial constraints and am willing to negotiate further. I am now offering the product to you for $10500. This price reflects a compromise between our initial offers and maintains a fair profit margin for us. Please let me know if this revised price meets your requirements.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your patience, Bob. I understand your financial situation and am willing to make a final adjustment. I am now offering the product to you for $9500. This price reflects a significant compromise and allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. Please let me know if this revised price is acceptable for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $9500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8800 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
